text: Crepaja (, ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Kovačica municipality, in the South Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority (88.15%) and its population numbering 4,855 people (2002 census). ==Historical population== *1961: 5,516 *1971: 5,289 *1981: 5,369 *1991: 5,128 *2002: 4,855 ==References== *Slobodan Ćurčić, Broj stanovnika Vojvodine, Novi Sad, 1996. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Serbian Banat Category:Populated places in South Banat District Category:Kovačica
title: Crepaja
